mapper.insert: insert into ps_board (idx, title, content, ps_sdate, ps_fdate, p_size, comment, terms, g_fname, m_addr) values (#{idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{ps_sdate}, #{ps_fdate}, #{p_size}, #{comment}, #{terms}, #{g_fname}, #{m_addr})
mapper.select: select * from member where idx = (select idx from ps_board where psb_idx = #{psb_idx})
select avg(rate) from r_board where ps_nick = #{ps_nick} group by ps_nick
select count(rate) from r_board where ps_nick = #{ps_nick} group by ps_nick
mapper.insert: insert into reservation (idx, ps_idx, pay, s_date, f_date, r_date) values (#{idx}, #{ps_idx}, #{pay}, #{s_date}, #{f_date}, #{r_date})
mapper.update: update member set point = point + #{money} where idx = #{idx}
update member set point = point - #{pay} where idx = #{idx}
